price: 17. Diggah nanu makki mara qulul kee qabaarat niqiyyire bustaan mara kah niqiyyire innah, usun subci wakti kay caxammixu tumaleelak qellut yargiqoonu waanamah xiibiten waqdi.
arabic: إِنَّا بَلَوۡنَٰهُمۡ كَمَا بَلَوۡنَآ أَصۡحَٰبَ ٱلۡجَنَّةِ إِذۡ أَقۡسَمُواْ لَيَصۡرِمُنَّهَا مُصۡبِحِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: innā balawnāhum kamā balawnā aṣḥāba al-janati idh aqsamū layaṣrimunnahā muṣ'biḥīna
